alert.note: Alert for Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Suffolk County through 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lindenhurst, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deer Park, Lindenhurst, Babylon, Robert Moses State Park, Amityville, Captree State Park, Gilgo State Park, West Islip, Copiague, Wyandanch, Baywood, East Farmingdale, Brightwaters and Saltaire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
